email_body: maybe a drink after work... Caroline Abramo@ENRON 03/23/2001 07:29 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: today can i grab you for a few minutes after the close to update you on fund stuff. also, if you do not have plans tonight.. jen fraser and i were thinking of having a little bbq (i am staying with her).. your presence is requested!! if not, we are up for a few drinks after work,...
